data.description: OO Interface to processing tab delimited fil
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
This is a companion module to Text::Delimited. Since the vast
    majority of delimited files processed in my company's field are
    TabFile, setting aside a module specific to that makes sense. This
    module relies on Text::Delimited as it's core, as well as provies a
    few tab-specific exports.
